attributes.action: instruct his Government to concentrate on the pressing matters in hand including the Climate Change Bill and the return of troops from Iraq and not to be distracted by the calls for an unnecessary and expensive winter election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government, having more than 2 years of its mandate remaining, should concentrate on the serious issues that confront this country, including the Climate Change Bill, the Energy Review and the withdrawal for all troops from Iraq, and should not be distracted by calls for an unnecessary and expensive winter election campaign.
